subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pat Burrell hit a three-run homer in the eighth inning Monday night, and the Phillies, the leaders of the National League East, beat the visiting Atlanta Braves, 6-2, for their 10th win in 11 games.
snippet: Pat Burrell hit a three-run homer in the eighth inning Monday night, and the Phillies, the leaders of the National League East, beat the visiting Atlanta Braves, 6-2, for their 10th win in 11 games.
